txt.en: Shikavi has asked you to try and reach Kina and help him see the realities of pirate life.

'Oh my, Kina. How could you?

'I hope you are all right. I did not think it would be so dangerous to speak to my child.

'This is far more serious than I could have ever imagined.'
Kina has run away disinterested in what you have to say leaving you to deal with his friends.
Talk to Kina in the Gut

'Kina has convinced himself that he will one day rule the Corsairs and even this city. I cannot reach him. I am accused of not being supportive and pushing him away... but I know for a fact these Corsairs do not care for Kina. They use him as a slave with promises of space on one of their boats and a share of spoils.\n\n'I have seen how they treat Kina. Would you please help me get through to him?'
You handled Kina's supposed friends, but they ran away in the process. You should tell Shikavi.
Shikavi is concerned that her child is romanticizing the life of a Corsair and may travel down a path she cannot follow.
